Room.Name: Phexton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the southern outskirts of a mountain village called Phexton.
Room.LongDescription: You can see a few large houses along the road on either side, and in the distance you see the village proper. The houses you see appear to be made of native boulders with heavily thatched roofs, and are almost three stories tall. These are the homes of of the Mountain Giants.
